page.title: 13THE POLICE IN YEOVIL
page.content: In Yeovil Police force there are about 75 men and 8 women.They have shifts from 6am-2pm,2pm-10pm and 10pm-6am. Friday and Saturday nights are the hectic nights because there are the nightclubs and pubs.There are drugs in Yeovil,and Yeovil police used to have their own drugs quad but now they are stationed at Frome.Yeovil is the divisional headquarters for a wide area of Somerset. There are a few tramps in Yeovil who sleep out in the market under the stalls.One of the biggest problems in Yeovil is the increase of shop-lifting and drunk driving. Yeovil Police Station has 8 male and 3 female cells and 2 detention cells for juvenile offenders(people under 17 years of age.)
